anyone know how to make my wireless card: cause wifi-radar will not check ra0
have you looked at the /etc/iftab file?
there you can change the mapping of eth or whatever to point to a specific MAC address
only reason I know that works is because I changed my wireless from eth1 to eth0 there
you need to change a few things first
you could change the ip information in the /etc/network/interfaces file then do an ifdown and ifup to "disable and enable" the interface
or you could reboot, but the system will not be on the net yet you need to modify the network properties for the interfaces still
